Posts.Content: Shonna71-47 wrote: So today I had my six month follow-up for a fibroadenoma....went for mano and they kept asking for more views because the radiologist wanted to magnify areas, then had ultrasound done! Radiologist said he some calcifications that weren’t there 6 months ago and wants a mammo biopsy. Also had appointment for 6 month follow up with my breast surgeon today....he seemed concerned! Never said the word cancer but suggested I have surgery with the guided mammo to biopsy the calcifications he said he’s 50/50 on it being cancer....I’m a nervous nelly Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I had my six month follow up todayfor a previous fibroadenoma Shonna71-47 mandih
